custom_nodes.author: #NOTICE_1.13
custom_nodes.title: NOTICE: This channel is not the default channel.
custom_nodes.description:
If you see this message, your ComfyUI-Manager is outdated.
Recent channel provides only the list of the latest nodes. If you want to find the complete node list, please go to the Default channel.
Making LoRA has never been easier!

custom_nodes.author: mithamunda
custom_nodes.title: Together Vision Node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node for generating AI-powered image descriptions using Together AI's Vision models (both free and paid versions). Features include customizable prompts, advanced generation parameters, and robust image handling with comprehensive error management.

custom_nodes.author: Slickytail
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-InstantX-IPAdapter-SD3
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI implementation of the [a/InstantX IP-Adapter for SD3.5 Large](https://huggingface.co/InstantX/SD3.5-Large-IP-Adapter).

custom_nodes.author: NeoGriever
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI - NeoGriever
custom_nodes.description: NeoGriever's helper nodes. Better CLIP Text Encoder, Resolution Provider,  Multimask Write/Read,  TextBoxes Simple/Join/x2/x3, Sliders INT/FLOAT/STEPPER, String Tool/Squisher/Cutter, Create Solid Color, Fill with Color, Checkerboard Generator, Image Progress Bar

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ICC-nodes

custom_nodes.author: sourceful-official
custom_nodes.title: LoadLoraModelOnlyWithUrl
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LoadLoraModelOnlyWithUrl

custom_nodes.author: huanngzh
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MVAdapter
custom_nodes.description: This extension integrates [a/MV-Adapter](https://github.com/huanngzh/MV-Adapter) into ComfyUI, allowing users to generate multi-view consistent images from text prompts or single images directly within the ComfyUI interface.

custom_nodes.author: kimara-ai
custom_nodes.title: Kimara.ai's Advanced Watermarking Tools
custom_nodes.description: The KimaraAIWatermarker custom node allows you to apply watermark text and logo overlays to images. Optionally, the watermark can be moved by the move_watermark_step amount of pixels after each generated image. To apply a moving watermark to a list of images, use the KimaraAIBatchImages node to concatenate the list into a single tensor, then use that as an input for the watermark node, as shown in the example image below.

custom_nodes.author: PauldeLavallaz
custom_nodes.title: Claude Prompt Generator
custom_nodes.description: Node that generates prompts using Anthropic Claude API.

custom_nodes.author: NyaamZ
custom_nodes.title: Get Booru Tag ExtendeD
custom_nodes.description: Get tag from Booru site.

custom_nodes.author: Aerse
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Seed-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-Seed-Nodes is a custom node library that extends the functionality of ComfyUI, offering advanced image loading and pixelation tools.

custom_nodes.author: ClownsharkBatwing
custom_nodes.title: RES4LYF
custom_nodes.description: Advanced samplers with new noise scaling math to enable SDE sampling with all publicly available rectified flow models; new unsampling/noise inversion methods and other advanced techniques for inpainting and/or guiding the sampling process with latent images. 40 sampler types, 20 noise types, 7 noise scaling modes, in a single node. Also includes a wide variety of QoF and other utility nodes for manipulating sigmas, latents, images, and more.

custom_nodes.author: duskfallcrew
custom_nodes.title: Embedding Merge for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: duhaifeng
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Flux-Inpainting
custom_nodes.description: This node wraps the flux fill model as ComfyUI nodes. Use NF4 flux fill model, support for inpainting and outpainting image. Compared to the flux fill dev model, these nodes can use the flux fill model to perform inpainting and outpainting work under lower VRM conditions.

custom_nodes.author: SparknightLLC
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MaskArbiter
custom_nodes.description: A node for ComfyUI that takes a list of masks and returns a single mask based on your criteria. For example, it can be used to mask the leftmost subject in an image containing more than one subject of the same class. The workflow below demonstrates the difference between Mask Arbiter (top) and traditional Grounding DINO masking (bottom.)

custom_nodes.description: Bytebeat is like composing music with the tools of a programmerâ€™s toolkit. Instead of piano keys, you have operators like >>, |, and &. Itâ€™s like giving your CPU a guitar and letting it shred! ðŸ¤˜

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Pixtral Large Extension
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI custom node that integrates Mistral AI's Pixtral Large vision model, enabling powerful multimodal AI capabilities within ComfyUI. Pixtral Large is a 124B parameter model (123B decoder + 1B vision encoder) that can analyze up to 30 high-resolution images simultaneously.

custom_nodes.author: wu12023
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Image-Evaluation
custom_nodes.description: An extension to ComfyUI that evaluates images using multiple models.

custom_nodes.author: windfancy
custom_nodes.title: zsq_prompt
custom_nodes.description: NODES: PromptStyler, PromptLatent, PromptCLIPEncode, PromptSelector

custom_nodes.author: bobsblazed
custom_nodes.title: Bobs_Latent_Optimizer
custom_nodes.description: This custom node for ComfyUI is designed to optimize latent generation for use with FLUX, SDXL and SD3. It provides flexible control over aspect ratios, megapixel sizes, and upscale factors, allowing users to dynamically create latents that fit specific tiling and resolution needs.

custom_nodes.author: logtd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LTXTricks
custom_nodes.description: A set of nodes that provide additional controls for the LTX Video model

custom_nodes.author: Kai Duehrkop
custom_nodes.title: Advanced Reflux control
custom_nodes.description: This extension offers a new Apply-Style node for Redux that allows for changing the influence of the conditioning image on the final outcome. This effectively allows for changing the style or content of an image using a prompt while using Redux.

custom_nodes.author: ramesh-x90
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_pyannote
custom_nodes.description: This repository provides custom nodes for ComfyUI designed to process audio files, performing speaker diarization and integrating speaker data into whisper-transcribed segments. These nodes utilize the PyAnnote library for speaker identification and pandas for efficient data handling.

custom_nodes.author: ShmuelRonen
custom_nodes.title: Apply Style Model Adjust for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: A custom node that provides enhanced control over style transfer balance when using FLUX style models in ComfyUI. This node offers better control over the influence of text prompts versus style reference images.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Html2Image
custom_nodes.description: NODES:Webpage Screenshot, Camera Watermark

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for LTXVideo model.

custom_nodes.description: NODES:Load IPAdapter Flux Model, Apply IPAdapter Flux Model

custom_nodes.author: licyk
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HakuImg
custom_nodes.description: Image processing tool for ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: SparknightLLC
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LatentClamp
custom_nodes.description: A node for ComfyUI that modifies the values in the samples input that fall outside of a min and max range using a multiplier.

custom_nodes.author: Black-Lioness
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PromptUtils
custom_nodes.description: A set of ComfyUI nodes designed to enhance your workflow with realistic filename generation and keyword generation.

custom_nodes.author: iamandeepsandhu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-NSFW-Check
custom_nodes.description: his project is designed to detect whether images generated by ComfyUI are Not Safe For Work (NSFW). It uses a machine learning model to classify images as either safe or not safe for work and returns a confidence score for the NSFW classification.

custom_nodes.author: SimonHeese
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_AnimationNodes
custom_nodes.description: NODES:Animated Offset Padding, Animated Rotation & Zoom

custom_nodes.author: xuhongming251
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_Camera
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI processes local real-time camera feed and provides real-time preview of the result.

custom_nodes.author: bombax-xiaoice
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Allegro
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI supports over [a/rhymes-ai/Allegro](https://huggingface.co/rhymes-ai/Allegro), which uses text prompt to generate short video in relatively high quality, especially comparing to other open source solutions available for now.
